channel.title: Mythology - Developers needed
channel.description:
ight, well i am starting a new server, Named Mythology. None of that 562 shit here.
Info: Server Name:Mythology. Client Base: Project Insanity Server based off: Massacred World. Owner: Pot up pls.
[b][i]Goals:[/i][/b]
[b]Perfected Combat. Clipped following Perfect P.K. N.P.C. clipping Perfected models Two worlds (in the future) More miniGames. Full Screen. [/b] i havn't really done much to this server at the moment, As i have only just came back to RSPS.
What we Will be doing to the server. [code] New Home (edge sucks) New name (maybe) New Bosses. improve Combat. improve stabilty. New client Features. Full screen. And alot more.[/code]
Application: [code] Age: Experience: What Position, your going for: [/code]
Programmers, will be getting paid - from the donations, from the server. We will all be getting paid the same. The positions that are open is: [code] Server Programmer. Client Programmer. Gfx. Forums Gfx[/code]
Pictures. Crystal key Chest! [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/2cz957b.png[/img]
Crystal keys! [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/k1phc1.png[/img]
Gambling! [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/28sojtu.png[/img]
Reset Stats! [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/xkq7tu.png[/img]
Caskets! [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/2ugl94o.png[/img]
Hp Bars! [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/9izarc.png[/img]
If You want to see more, please add me on msn: dan_hawkinss@hotmail.co.uk

item.description:
@pot_up_pls wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:9, topic:396918”][quote author=pot up pls link=topic=494076.msg3612251#msg3612251 date=1306688897]

was you able to fix the webclient?

Webclient didn’t come with.
[/quote]Yeah I have been trying to make one from it for past couple of days with no success kind of irritating it freezes at start up which would generally mean it isn’t going to a path correctly but I know everything is right…[/quote]
I havn’t tryed making webclient yet, Goodluck fixing though.

Read full topic
